title: Bandit

fields.name: Armed Robbery:
fields.value: Attack a player. If you successfully kill them, you will gain a charge for one of your other abilities depending on their subalignment. You may use as many abilities "in conjunction with" this ability as you wish, as long as you have ammo for all of them.

fields.name: Brutal Murder (x0, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Use in conjunction with Armed Robbery. Your Attack Power is 1.7x. This ability gains ammo if you kill a player with a Killing subalignment.

fields.name: Knock Down (x0, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Use in conjunction with Armed Robbery. Your target is roleblocked. This ability gains ammo if you kill a player with a Protective or Support subalignment.

fields.name: In the Shadows (x0, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Use in conjunction with armed Robbery. Your attack is Astral. This ability gains ammo if you kill a player with a Deception or Investigative subalignment.

fields.name: Ultimate Power (x0):
fields.value: If you use this ability, your Armed Robbery ability will hit anyone who visits or is visited by your target. This ability gains ammo if you kill a player with Power, Head, Elder, or similar subalignment.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Three or fewer players, including yourself, are alive, and none of them besides you are Neutral Killing. Reaching this win condition ends the game.
